markdownRemark.html:
Do more by taking on fewer disparate projects. Look for the projects that will make others easier or unnecessary.

Focus projects on a single purpose to reduce distractions and change scope to build momentum across multiple areas.

frontmatter.description: Do more by taking on fewer disparate projects. Look for the projects that will make others easier or unnecessary.
frontmatter.title: Focus projects on a single purpose to reduce distractions
